And Moses<S>4872</S> with the elders<S>2205</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> commanded<S>6680</S> the people<S>5971</S>, saying<S>559</S>, Keep<S>8104</S> all the commandments<S>4687</S> which I command<S>6680</S> you this day<S>3117</S>.
And it shall be on the day<S>3117</S> when ye shall pass over<S>5674</S> Jordan<S>3383</S> unto the land<S>776</S> which the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> giveth<S>5414</S> thee, that thou shalt set thee up<S>6965</S> great<S>1419</S> stones<S>68</S>, and plaister<S>7874</S> them with plaister<S>7875</S>:
And thou shalt write<S>3789</S> upon them all the words<S>1697</S> of this law<S>8451</S>, when thou art passed over<S>5674</S>, that thou mayest go in<S>935</S> unto the land<S>776</S> which the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> giveth<S>5414</S> thee, a land<S>776</S> that floweth<S>2100</S> with milk<S>2461</S> and honey<S>1706</S>; as the LORD<S>3068</S> God<S>430</S> of thy fathers<S>1</S> hath promised<S>1696</S> thee.
Therefore it shall be when ye be gone over<S>5674</S> Jordan<S>3383</S>, that ye shall set up<S>6965</S> these stones<S>68</S>, which I command<S>6680</S> you this day<S>3117</S>, in mount<S>2022</S> Ebal<S>5858</S>, and thou shalt plaister<S>7875</S> them with plaister<S>7874</S>.
And there shalt thou build<S>1129</S> an altar<S>4196</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S>, an altar<S>4196</S> of stones<S>68</S>: thou shalt not lift up<S>5130</S> any iron<S>1270</S> tool upon them.
Thou shalt build<S>1129</S> the altar<S>4196</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> of whole<S>8003</S> stones<S>68</S>: and thou shalt offer<S>5927</S> burnt offerings<S>5930</S> thereon unto the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S>:
And thou shalt offer<S>2076</S> peace offerings<S>8002</S>, and shalt eat<S>398</S> there, and rejoice<S>8055</S> before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S>.
And thou shalt write<S>3789</S> upon the stones<S>68</S> all the words<S>1697</S> of this law<S>8451</S> very<S>3190</S> plainly<S>874</S>.
And Moses<S>4872</S> and the priests<S>3548</S> the Levites<S>3881</S> spake<S>1696</S> unto all Israel<S>3478</S>, saying<S>559</S>, Take heed<S>5535</S>, and hearken<S>8085</S>, O Israel<S>3478</S>; this day<S>3117</S> thou art become<S>1961</S> the people<S>5971</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S>.
Thou shalt therefore obey<S>8085</S> the voice<S>6963</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S>, and do<S>6213</S> his commandments<S>4687</S> and his statutes<S>2706</S>, which I command<S>6680</S> thee this day<S>3117</S>.
And Moses<S>4872</S> charged<S>6680</S> the people<S>5971</S> the same day<S>3117</S>, saying<S>559</S>,
These shall stand<S>5975</S> upon mount<S>2022</S> Gerizim<S>1630</S> to bless<S>1288</S> the people<S>5971</S>, when ye are come over<S>5674</S> Jordan<S>3383</S>; Simeon<S>8095</S>, and Levi<S>3878</S>, and Judah<S>3063</S>, and Issachar<S>3485</S>, and Joseph<S>3130</S>, and Benjamin<S>1144</S>:
And these shall stand<S>5975</S> upon mount<S>2022</S> Ebal<S>5858</S> to curse<S>7045</S>; Reuben<S>7205</S>, Gad<S>1410</S>, and Asher<S>836</S>, and Zebulun<S>2074</S>, Dan<S>1835</S>, and Naphtali<S>5321</S>. <sup>to curse: Heb. for a cursing</sup>
And the Levites<S>3881</S> shall speak<S>6030</S>, and say<S>559</S> unto all the men<S>376</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> with a loud<S>7311</S> voice<S>6963</S>,
Cursed<S>779</S> be the man<S>376</S> that maketh<S>6213</S> any graven<S>6459</S> or molten image<S>4541</S>, an abomination<S>8441</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>, the work<S>4639</S> of the hands<S>3027</S> of the craftsman<S>2796</S>, and putteth<S>7760</S> it in a secret<S>5643</S> place. And all the people<S>5971</S> shall answer<S>6030</S> and say<S>559</S>, Amen<S>543</S>.
Cursed<S>779</S> be he that setteth light<S>7034</S> by his father<S>1</S> or his mother<S>517</S>. And all the people<S>5971</S> shall say<S>559</S>, Amen<S>543</S>.
Cursed<S>779</S> be he that removeth<S>5253</S> his neighbour's<S>7453</S> landmark<S>1366</S>. And all the people<S>5971</S> shall say<S>559</S>, Amen<S>543</S>.
Cursed<S>779</S> be he that maketh the blind<S>5787</S> to wander<S>7686</S> out of the way<S>1870</S>. And all the people<S>5971</S> shall say<S>559</S>, Amen<S>543</S>.
Cursed<S>779</S> be he that perverteth<S>5186</S> the judgment<S>4941</S> of the stranger<S>1616</S>, fatherless<S>3490</S>, and widow<S>490</S>. And all the people<S>5971</S> shall say<S>559</S>, Amen<S>543</S>.
Cursed<S>779</S> be he that lieth<S>7901</S> with his father's<S>1</S> wife<S>802</S>; because he uncovereth<S>1540</S> his father's<S>1</S> skirt<S>3671</S>. And all the people<S>5971</S> shall say<S>559</S>, Amen<S>543</S>.
Cursed<S>779</S> be he that lieth<S>7901</S> with any manner of beast<S>929</S>. And all the people<S>5971</S> shall say<S>559</S>, Amen<S>543</S>.
Cursed<S>779</S> be he that lieth<S>7901</S> with his sister<S>269</S>, the daughter<S>1323</S> of his father<S>1</S>, or the daughter<S>1323</S> of his mother<S>517</S>. And all the people<S>5971</S> shall say<S>559</S>, Amen<S>543</S>.
Cursed<S>779</S> be he that lieth<S>7901</S> with his mother in law<S>2859</S>. And all the people<S>5971</S> shall say<S>559</S>, Amen<S>543</S>.
Cursed<S>779</S> be he that smiteth<S>5221</S> his neighbour<S>7453</S> secretly<S>5643</S>. And all the people<S>5971</S> shall say<S>559</S>, Amen<S>543</S>.
Cursed<S>779</S> be he that taketh<S>3947</S> reward<S>7810</S> to slay<S>5221</S> an innocent<S>5355</S> person<S>5315</S> <S>1818</S>. And all the people<S>5971</S> shall say<S>559</S>, Amen<S>543</S>.
Cursed<S>779</S> be he that confirmeth<S>6965</S> not all the words<S>1697</S> of this law<S>8451</S> to do<S>6213</S> them. And all the people<S>5971</S> shall say<S>559</S>, Amen<S>543</S>.
